member.name: FILE_SYSTEM_RECOGNITION_INFORMATION
member.summary: Contains file system recognition information retrieved by the FSCTL_QUERY_FILE_SYSTEM_RECOGNITION control code.

member.name: FILE_SYSTEM_RECOGNITION_INFORMATION.FileSystem
member.summary: The file system name stored on the disk. This is a null-terminated string of 8 ASCII characters that represents the nonlocalizable human-readable name of the file system the volume is formatted with.
